en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal enegy, realised through The grace of divine preceptor.
One Oankar, the primal enegy, realised through The grace of divine preceptor.
I bow before the primeval Lord who has been told as the primordial cause of all.

verse.gurmukhi: so siqguru scw vysu sbid is\wixAw[
verse.unicode: ਸੋ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਸਚਾ ਵੇਸੁ ਸਬਦਿ ਸਿਞਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: Truth incarnate that true Guru is realised through the Word.

transliteration.english: so satigur sachaa ves sabadh sin(j)aaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: सो सतिगुरु सचा वेसु सबदि सिञाणिआ।
transliteration.en: so satigur sachaa ves sabadh sin(j)aaniaa|
transliteration.hi: सो सतिगुरु सचा वेसु सबदि सिञाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɔ sət̪ɪGʊr sət͡ʃɑ ʋes səbəd̪ sɪŋɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سو ستگر سچا وےس سبد سنجاݨآ۔

en.bdb: Only they have realised Him whose surati (consciousness) has merged into the truth after accepting the commands of the Word.
Holy congregation is the genuine basis and authentic abode of truth.
Wherein the individual inspired by loving devotion enjoys the innate delight.
Lord, kind to the devotees and the glory of the poor, also assimilates Himself in the holy congregation.

verse.gurmukhi: bRhmw ibsnu mhysu AMqu n jwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਬ੍ਰਹਮਾ ਬਿਸਨੁ ਮਹੇਸੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਜਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: Even Brahma, Visnu, Mahesa could not know His mysteries.

transliteration.english: brahamaa bisan mahes a(n)t na jaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: ब्रहमा बिसनु महेसु अंतु न जाणिआ।
transliteration.en: brahamaa bisan mahes a(n)t na jaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: ब्रहमा बिसनु महेसु अंतु न जाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: bɹəhəmɑ bɪsən məhes əŋt̪ nə d͡ʒɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: برهما بسن مهےس اںت ن جاݨآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: ismir shis Px sysu iqlu n pCwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਿਮਰਿ ਸਹਸਿ ਫਣ ਸੇਸੁ ਤਿਲੁ ਨ ਪਛਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: Sesanag remembering Him with its thousand hoods could not understand Him.

transliteration.english: simar sahas fan ses til na pachhaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: सिमरि सहसि फण सेसु तिलु न पछाणिआ।
transliteration.en: simar sahas fan ses til na pachhaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: सिमरि सहसि फण सेसु तिलु न पछाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɪmər səhəs fəɳ ses t̪ɪl nə pəɕɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سِمر سهس پھݨ سےس تل ن پچھاݨآ۔

en.bdb: The truth is pleasing to those gurmukhs who have become dervish at the door of holy congregation.
Guru and disciple

verse.gurmukhi: guru cyly rhrwis AlKu AByau hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰੁ ਚੇਲੇ ਰਹਰਾਸਿ ਅਲਖੁ ਅਭੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: The ways of the Guru and the disciple are mysterious and imperceptible.

transliteration.english: gur chele raharaas alakh abheau hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरु चेले रहरासि अलखु अभेउ है।
transliteration.en: gur chele raharaas alakh abheau hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरु चेले रहरासि अलखु अभेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr t͡ʃele rəhərɑs ələkʰ əɓeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُر چےلے رهراس الکھ ابھےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: guru cyly swbwis nwnk dyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰੁ ਚੇਲੇ ਸਾਬਾਸਿ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Guru (Nanak) and disciple (Angad) both are blest (because both have merged into each other).

transliteration.english: gur chele saabaas naanak dheau hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरु चेले साबासि नानक देउ है।
transliteration.en: gur chele saabaas naanak dheau hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरु चेले साबासि नानक देउ है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr t͡ʃele sɑbɑs nɑnək d̪eo hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُر چےلے ساباس نانک دےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmiq shij invwsu isPiq smyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਮੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Their abode is the wisdom of Guru and they both are rapt in the praises of the Lord.

transliteration.english: gurmat sahaj nivaas sifat sameau hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमति सहजि निवासु सिफति समेउ है।
transliteration.en: gurmat sahaj nivaas sifat sameau hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमति सहजि निवासु सिफति समेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmət̪ səhəd͡ʒ nɪʋɑs sɪfət̪ səmeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمت سهج نواس سپھت سمےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: sbid suriq prgws ACl ACyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਪਰਗਾਸ ਅਛਲ ਅਛੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Enlightened with the Word their consciousness has become infinite and immutable.

transliteration.english: sabadh surat paragaas achhal achheau hai|
transliteration.hindi: सबदि सुरति परगास अछल अछेउ है।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat paragaas achhal achheau hai|
transliteration.hi: सबदि सुरति परगास अछल अछेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ pərəGɑs əɕəl əɕeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت پرگاس اچھل اچھےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK Aws inrws miq ArKyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਆਸ ਨਿਰਾਸ ਮਤਿ ਅਰਖੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Transcending all hopes they have assimilated subtle wisdom in their person.

transliteration.english: gurmukh aas niraas mat arakheau hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि आस निरास मति अरखेउ है।
transliteration.en: gurmukh aas niraas mat arakheau hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि आस निरास मति अरखेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ əɑs nɪrɑs mət̪ ərəkʰeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ آس نراس مت ارکھےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: kwm kroD ivxwsu isPiq smyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਕਾਮ ਕਰੋਧ ਵਿਣਾਸੁ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਮੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Conquering the lust and anger they have absorbed themselves in the praises (of God).

transliteration.english: kaam karodh vinaas sifat sameau hai|
transliteration.hindi: काम करोध विणासु सिफति समेउ है।
transliteration.en: kaam karodh vinaas sifat sameau hai|
transliteration.hi: काम करोध विणासु सिफति समेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: kɑm kərɔt̪ə̀ ʋɪɳɑs sɪfət̪ səmeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: کام کرودھ وݨاس سپھت سمےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: siq sMqoK aulws skiq n syau hY[
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿ ਸੰਤੋਖ ਉਲਾਸ ਸਕਤਿ ਨ ਸੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Beyond the abodes of Siva and Sakti they have reached the abode of truth, contentment and  bliss.

transliteration.english: sat sa(n)tokh ulaas sakat na seau hai|
transliteration.hindi: सति संतोख उलास सकति न सेउ है।
transliteration.en: sat sa(n)tokh ulaas sakat na seau hai|
transliteration.hi: सति संतोख उलास सकति न सेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: sət̪ səŋt̪ɔkʰ oʊlɑs səkət̪ nə seo hæ.
transliteration.ur: ست سںتوکھ اُلاس سکت ن سےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: Gr hI ivic audwsu scu sucyau hY[
verse.unicode: ਘਰ ਹੀ ਵਿਚਿ ਉਦਾਸੁ ਸਚੁ ਸੁਚੇਉ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Being indifferent to household (pleasures) they are truth-oriented.

transliteration.english: ghar hee vich udhaas sach sucheau hai|
transliteration.hindi: घर ही विचि उदासु सचु सुचेउ है।
transliteration.en: ghar hee vich udhaas sach sucheau hai|
transliteration.hi: घर ही विचि उदासु सचु सुचेउ है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰər hi ʋɪt͡ʃ oʊd̪ɑs sət͡ʃ sʊt͡ʃeo hæ.
transliteration.ur: گھر هیِ وچ اُداس سچ سُچےا هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh AiBAwsu gur isK dyau hY ]2]
verse.unicode: ਵੀਹ ਇਕੀਹ ਅਭਿਆਸੁ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਦੇਉ ਹੈ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: The Guru and disciple have now attain the ratio of twenty and twenty One, i.e. the disciple has gone ahead of the Guru.

transliteration.english: veeh ikeeh abhiaas gur sikh dheau hai ||2||
transliteration.hindi: वीह इकीह अभिआसु गुर सिख देउ है ॥२॥
transliteration.en: veeh ikeeh abhiaas gur sikh dheau hai ||2||
transliteration.hi: वीह इकीह अभिआसु गुर सिख देउ है ॥२॥
transliteration.ipa: ʋih eɪkih əɓɪəɑs Gʊr sɪkʰ d̪eo hæ.2.
transliteration.ur: ویِه اکیِه ابھآس گُر سکھ دےا هَے ۔۔۲۔۔

en.bdb: Guru and disciple
The disciple who obeys the commands of the Guru is called gurmukh.
The actions of  the gurmukh are awe-inspiring and their glory is indescribable.
Considering creation as the form of the Creator he feels to be a sacrifice unto it.
In the world he feels himself as a guest and the world a guest house.
Truth is his real Guru whom he speaks and listens to.
Like a  bard, at the doors of the holy congregation, he recites the hymns of the Guru (gurbani).
For him the holy congregation is the basis of his acquaintance with the omniscient Lord.
His consciousness remains absorbed in the graceful true Word.
True court of justice for him is the holy congregation and through Word the true identity of it he establishes in his heart.
Guru and disciple

verse.gurmukhi: sbdu gurU guru vwhu gurmuiK pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਵਾਹੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: From the Guru the disciple obtains the wondrous Word

transliteration.english: sabadh guroo gur vaahu gurmukh paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सबदु गुरू गुरु वाहु गुरमुखि पाइआ।
transliteration.en: sabadh guroo gur vaahu gurmukh paiaa|
transliteration.hi: सबदु गुरू गुरु वाहु गुरमुखि पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ Gʊru Gʊr ʋɑh Gʊrəmʊkʰ pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبد گُرُو گُر واهُ گُرمکھ پاایا۔

en.bdb: And as a disciple, merging his consciousness in it, comes face to face with imperceptible Lord.
Meeting the Guru, the disciple attains turia, the fourth and final stage  of spiritual quietude.
He holds unfathomable and serene Lord dearly in his heart.
Becoming carefree that true disciple merges himself in the truth.
And by becoming the king of kings he makes others subservient to him.
Only he loves the divine will of the Lord.
And only he has tasted the nectar in the form of praises of the Lord.
Taking consciousness into the depth of Word, he has shaped the unchiselled mind.
The gurmukh-wayfarer

verse.gurmukhi: muil n imlY Amolu n kImiq pweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਮੁਲਿ ਨ ਮਿਲੈ ਅਮੋਲੁ ਨ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: The way of life of gurmukhs is invaluable;

transliteration.english: mul na milai amol na keemat paieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: मुलि न मिलै अमोलु न कीमति पाईऐ।
transliteration.en: mul na milai amol na keemat paieeaai|
transliteration.hi: मुलि न मिलै अमोलु न कीमति पाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: mʊl nə mɪlæ əmɔl nə kimət̪ pɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: مُل ن ملَے امول ن کیِمت پاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: pwie qrwjU qolu n Aqulu qulweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਪਾਇ ਤਰਾਜੂ ਤੋਲੁ ਨ ਅਤੁਲੁ ਤੁਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: It cannot be purchased; on weighing scale it cannot be weighed.

transliteration.english: pai taraajoo tol na atul tulaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: पाइ तराजू तोलु न अतुलु तुलाईऐ।
transliteration.en: pai taraajoo tol na atul tulaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: पाइ तराजू तोलु न अतुलु तुलाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: pɑeɪ t̪ərɑd͡ʒu t̪ɔl nə ət̪ʊl t̪ʊlɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: پاا تراجُو تول ن اتل تُلاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: inj Gir qKqu Afolu n foil folweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਤਖਤੁ ਅਡੋਲੁ ਨ ਡੋਲਿ ਡੋਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Stabilizing in one’s own self and not getting frivolous in his way of life.

transliteration.english: nij ghar takhat addol na ddol ddolaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: निज घरि तखतु अडोलु न डोलि डोलाईऐ।
transliteration.en: nij ghar takhat addol na ddol ddolaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: निज घरि तखतु अडोलु न डोलि डोलाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər t̪əkʰət̪ əɖɔl nə ɖɔl ɖɔlɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: نِج گھر تکھت اڈول ن ڈول ڈولاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pMQ inrolu n rly rlweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥ ਨਿਰੋਲੁ ਨ ਰਲੇ ਰਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: This way is distinct and does not become defiled even when joined with some one else.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pa(n)th nirol na rale ralaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पंथ निरोलु न रले रलाईऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh pa(n)th nirol na rale ralaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पंथ निरोलु न रले रलाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pəŋt̪ʰ nɪrɔl nə rəle rəlɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پںتھ نرول ن رلے رلاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: kQw AkQ Abolu n bol bulweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕਥਾ ਅਕਥ ਅਬੋਲੁ ਨ ਬੋਲ ਬੁਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Its story is indescribable.

transliteration.english: kathaa akath abol na bol bulaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: कथा अकथ अबोलु न बोल बुलाईऐ।
transliteration.en: kathaa akath abol na bol bulaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: कथा अकथ अबोलु न बोल बुलाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: kət̪ʰɑ əkət̪ʰ əbɔl nə bɔl bʊlɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: کتھا اکتھ ابول ن بول بُلاایاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: sdw ABulu ABolu n Boil BulweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਸਦਾ ਅਭੁਲੁ ਅਭੋਲੁ ਨ ਭੋਲਿ ਭੁਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: This way transcends all ommissions and all anxieties.

transliteration.english: sadhaa abhul abhol na bhol bhulaieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: सदा अभुलु अभोलु न भोलि भुलाईऐ।
transliteration.en: sadhaa abhul abhol na bhol bhulaieeaai|
transliteration.hi: सदा अभुलु अभोलु न भोलि भुलाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: səd̪ɑ əɓʊl əɓɔl nə ɓɔl ɓʊlɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: سدا ابھل ابھول ن بھول بھُلاایاَے۔

en.bdb: Absorbed in equipoise this gurmukh-way of life gives balance to life.
The gurmukh quaffs from  the tank of nectar.

verse.gurmukhi: lK tolI iek tolu n Awpu gxweIAY ]5]
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਟੋਲੀ ਇਕ ਟੋਲੁ ਨ ਆਪੁ ਗਣਾਈਐ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: The end result of lacs of experiences is the gurmukh  never exhibits his ego.

transliteration.english: lakh Tolee ik Tol na aap ganaieeaai ||5||
transliteration.hindi: लख टोली इक टोलु न आपु गणाईऐ ॥५॥
transliteration.en: lakh Tolee ik Tol na aap ganaieeaai ||5||
transliteration.hi: लख टोली इक टोलु न आपु गणाईऐ ॥५॥
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ʈɔli eɪk ʈɔl nə əɑp Gəɳɑeiæ.5.
transliteration.ur: لکھ ٹولیِ اک ٹول ن آپ گݨاایاَے ۔۔۵۔۔

en.bdb: The merchandise of a gursikh
From the shop of holy congregation, through the Word, the merchandise of God’s name is procured.

verse.gurmukhi: pUrw pUry vit ik AwiK slwhIAY[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰਾ ਪੂਰੇ ਵਟਿ ਕਿ ਆਖਿ ਸਲਾਹੀਐ।

en.bdb: How to praise Him? The measuring criteria of  the perfect Lord are perfect.

transliteration.english: pooraa poore vaT k aakh salaaheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: पूरा पूरे वटि कि आखि सलाहीऐ।
transliteration.en: pooraa poore vaT k aakh salaaheeaai|
transliteration.hi: पूरा पूरे वटि कि आखि सलाहीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: purɑ pure ʋəʈ kə əɑkʰ səlɑhiæ.
transliteration.ur: پُورا پُورے وٹ ک آکھ سلاهیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: kdy n hovY Git scI piqswhIAY[
verse.unicode: ਕਦੇ ਨ ਹੋਵੈ ਘਟਿ ਸਚੀ ਪਤਿਸਾਹੀਐ।

en.bdb: The warehouse of the True King is never deficient.

transliteration.english: kadhe na hovai ghaT sachee patisaaheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: कदे न होवै घटि सची पतिसाहीऐ।
transliteration.en: kadhe na hovai ghaT sachee patisaaheeaai|
transliteration.hi: कदे न होवै घटि सची पतिसाहीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: kəd̪e nə hɔʋæ Gʰəʈ sət͡ʃi pət̪ɪsɑhiæ.
transliteration.ur: کدے ن هووَے گھٹ سچیِ پتِساهیِاَے۔

en.bdb: Cultivating the True Guru, those who earn through Him get merged into His inexhaustible Being.
The company of the saints is manifestly great; one should always be in and with it.

verse.gurmukhi: cwvl iekqy sit n dUjI vwhIAY[
verse.unicode: ਚਾਵਲ ਇਕਤੇ ਸਟਿ ਨ ਦੂਜੀ ਵਾਹੀਐ।

en.bdb: Husk in the form of maya should be separated from the rice of life

transliteration.english: chaaval ikate saT na dhoojee vaaheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: चावल इकते सटि न दूजी वाहीऐ।
transliteration.en: chaaval ikate saT na dhoojee vaaheeaai|
transliteration.hi: चावल इकते सटि न दूजी वाहीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃɑʋəl eɪkət̪e səʈ nə d̪ud͡ʒi ʋɑhiæ.
transliteration.ur: چاول اکتے سٹ ن دُوجیِ واهیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: jm dI PwhI kit dwid ielwhIAY[
verse.unicode: ਜਮ ਦੀ ਫਾਹੀ ਕਟਿ ਦਾਦਿ ਇਲਾਹੀਐ।

en.bdb: With strokes of discipline during this very life.

transliteration.english: jam dhee faahee kaT dhaadh ilaaheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: जम दी फाही कटि दादि इलाहीऐ।
transliteration.en: jam dhee faahee kaT dhaadh ilaaheeaai|
transliteration.hi: जम दी फाही कटि दादि इलाहीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒəm d̪i fɑhi kəʈ d̪ɑd̪ eɪlɑhiæ.
transliteration.ur: جم دیِ پھاهیِ کٹ داد الاهیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: pMjy dUq sMGit su FyrI FwhIAY[
verse.unicode: ਪੰਜੇ ਦੂਤ ਸੰਘਟਿ ਸੁ ਢੇਰੀ ਢਾਹੀਐ।

en.bdb: All the five evil propensities, should be decimated.

transliteration.english: pa(n)je dhoot sa(n)ghaT su dderee ddaaheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: पंजे दूत संघटि सु ढेरी ढाहीऐ।
transliteration.en: pa(n)je dhoot sa(n)ghaT su dderee ddaaheeaai|
transliteration.hi: पंजे दूत संघटि सु ढेरी ढाहीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: pəŋd͡ʒe d̪ut̪ səŋGʰəʈ s ʈeri ʈɑhiæ.
transliteration.ur: پںجے دُوت سںگھٹ سُ ڈھےریِ ڈھاهیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: pwxI ijau hirhit su Kyiq aumwhIAY ]6]
verse.unicode: ਪਾਣੀ ਜਿਉ ਹਰਿਹਟਿ ਸੁ ਖੇਤਿ ਉਮਾਹੀਐ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: As the  water of well keeps the fields green, the field of the consciousness should be kept verdant (with the help of shabad).

transliteration.english: paanee jiau harihaT su khet umaaheeaai ||6||
transliteration.hindi: पाणी जिउ हरिहटि सु खेति उमाहीऐ ॥६॥
transliteration.en: paanee jiau harihaT su khet umaaheeaai ||6||
transliteration.hi: पाणी जिउ हरिहटि सु खेति उमाहीऐ ॥६॥
transliteration.ipa: pɑɳi d͡ʒɪo hərɪhəʈ s kʰet̪ oʊmɑhiæ.6.
transliteration.ur: پاݨیِ جا هرهٹِ سُ کھےت اُماهیِاَے ۔۔۶۔۔

en.bdb: The true guru

verse.gurmukhi: pUrw siqguru Awip n AlKu lKwveI[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਆਪਿ ਨ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਵਈ।

en.bdb: Lord Himself is the true Guru who is imperceptible.

transliteration.english: pooraa satigur aap na alakh lakhaaviee|
transliteration.hindi: पूरा सतिगुरु आपि न अलखु लखावई।
transliteration.en: pooraa satigur aap na alakh lakhaaviee|
transliteration.hi: पूरा सतिगुरु आपि न अलखु लखावई।
transliteration.ipa: purɑ sət̪ɪGʊr əɑp nə ələkʰ ləkʰɑʋei.
transliteration.ur: پُورا ستگر آپ ن الکھ لکھاوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: dyKY Qwip auQwip ijau iqsu BwveI[
verse.unicode: ਦੇਖੈ ਥਾਪਿ ਉਥਾਪਿ ਜਿਉ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵਈ।

en.bdb: Of His own will He Establishes or uproots.

transliteration.english: dhekhai thaap uthaap jiau tis bhaaviee|
transliteration.hindi: देखै थापि उथापि जिउ तिसु भावई।
transliteration.en: dhekhai thaap uthaap jiau tis bhaaviee|
transliteration.hi: देखै थापि उथापि जिउ तिसु भावई।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ekʰæ t̪ʰɑp oʊt̪ʰɑp d͡ʒɪo t̪ɪs ɓɑʋei.
transliteration.ur: دےکھَے تھاپ اُتھاپ جا تس بھاوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: lypu n puMin n pwip aupwie smwveI[
verse.unicode: ਲੇਪੁ ਨ ਪੁੰਨਿ ਨ ਪਾਪਿ ਉਪਾਇ ਸਮਾਵਈ।

en.bdb: The sin and virtue of creation and destruction do not touch Him at all.

transliteration.english: lep na pu(n)n na paap upai samaaviee|
transliteration.hindi: लेपु न पुँनि न पापि उपाइ समावई।
transliteration.en: lep na pu(n)n na paap upai samaaviee|
transliteration.hi: लेपु न पुँनि न पापि उपाइ समावई।
transliteration.ipa: lep nə pʊŋn nə pɑp oʊpɑeɪ səmɑʋei.
transliteration.ur: لےپ ن پُنّ ن پاپ اُپاا سماوای۔

verse.gurmukhi: lgU vru n srwp n Awp jxwveI[
verse.unicode: ਲਗੂ ਵਰੁ ਨ ਸਰਾਪ ਨ ਆਪ ਜਣਾਵਈ।

en.bdb: He never makes anybody notice Him and boons and curses do not stick to Him.

transliteration.english: lagoo var na saraap na aap janaaviee|
transliteration.hindi: लगू वरु न सराप न आप जणावई।
transliteration.en: lagoo var na saraap na aap janaaviee|
transliteration.hi: लगू वरु न सराप न आप जणावई।
transliteration.ipa: ləGu ʋər nə sərɑp nə əɑp d͡ʒəɳɑʋei.
transliteration.ur: لگُو ور ن سراپ ن آپ جݨاوای۔

en.bdb: The true Guru recites the Word and unfolds the grandeur of that indescribable Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: AkQ kQw jpu jwip n jgqu kmwveI[
verse.unicode: ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਜਪੁ ਜਾਪਿ ਨ ਜਗਤੁ ਕਮਾਵਈ।

en.bdb: Eulogosong the ineffable (Lord) he does not indulge in hypocrisy and guile.

transliteration.english: akath kathaa jap jaap na jagat kamaaviee|
transliteration.hindi: अकथ कथा जपु जापि न जगतु कमावई।
transliteration.en: akath kathaa jap jaap na jagat kamaaviee|
transliteration.hi: अकथ कथा जपु जापि न जगतु कमावई।
transliteration.ipa: əkət̪ʰ kət̪ʰɑ d͡ʒəp d͡ʒɑp nə d͡ʒəGət̪ kəmɑʋei.
transliteration.ur: اکتھ کتھا جپ جاپ ن جگت کماوای۔

en.bdb: The effulgence of the perfect Guru finishes off the ego of the seekers of knowledge.
The Guru effacing the three suferings (god-sent, physical and spiritual) lessens the anxieties of the people.

verse.gurmukhi: gurbwxI mn DRwip inj Gir AwveI ]7]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਬਾਣੀ ਮਨ ਧ੍ਰਾਪਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਆਵਈ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: Getting satiated by the teachings of such a Guru, the individual stays in his innate nature.

transliteration.english: gurbaanee man dhraap nij ghar aaviee ||7||
transliteration.hindi: गुरबाणी मन ध्रापि निज घरि आवई ॥७॥
transliteration.en: gurbaanee man dhraap nij ghar aaviee ||7||
transliteration.hi: गुरबाणी मन ध्रापि निज घरि आवई ॥७॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəbɑɳi mən t̪ə̀ɹɑp nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər əɑʋei.7.
transliteration.ur: گُرباݨیِ من دھراپ نج گھر آوای ۔۔۷۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: pauVI 8 : guris`KW leI swDn dSw qy vrqn
verse.unicode: ਪਉੜੀ ੮ : ਗੁਰਸਿੱਖਾਂ ਲਈ ਸਾਧਨ ਦਸ਼ਾ ਤੇ ਵਰਤਨ

en.bdb: Means for the Sikhs, their state and conduct  ,

transliteration.english: pauRee 8 : gursi'khaa(n) liee saadhan dhashaa te varatan
transliteration.hindi: पउड़ी ८ : गुरसिक्खाँ लई साधन दशा ते वरतन
transliteration.en: pauRee 8 : gursi'khaa(n) liee saadhan dhashaa te varatan
transliteration.hi: पउड़ी ८ : गुरसिक्खाँ लई साधन दशा ते वरतन
transliteration.ipa: poʊɽi 8 : Gʊrəsɪkʰɑⁿ lei sɑt̪ən d̪əʃɑ t̪e ʋərət̪ən
transliteration.ur: پاڑیِ ۸ : گُرسّکھاں لای سادھن دشا تے ورتن

en.bdb: The perfect Guru is truth incarnate who is realised by becoming gurmukh.
The desire of the true Guru is that the Word should be sustained;
Burning the ego one will get honour in the court of Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: Gr hI jog jugiq bYsix DrmswlIAY[
verse.unicode: ਘਰ ਹੀ ਜੋਗ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਬੈਸਣਿ ਧਰਮਸਾਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: One should learn the technique of merging in the Lord by considering one’s home as the place for cultivating dharma.

transliteration.english: ghar hee jog jugat baisan dharamasaaleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: घर ही जोग जुगति बैसणि धरमसालीऐ।
transliteration.en: ghar hee jog jugat baisan dharamasaaleeaai|
transliteration.hi: घर ही जोग जुगति बैसणि धरमसालीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰər hi d͡ʒɔG d͡ʒʊGət̪ bæsəɳ t̪ərəməsɑliæ.
transliteration.ur: گھر هیِ جوگ جُگت بَےسݨ دھرمسالیِاَے۔

en.bdb: Liberation for them is certain who abide by the teaching of the Guru.
They having loving devotion in their heart remain jubliant.
Such people are emperors full of delight.
Becoming egoless  they serve the sangat, congregation, by bringing water, grinding corn etc. for it.
In humility and joy they lead altogether distinct life.
Characteristics of gurmukhs
The Guru preaches to the Sikh to be pure in conduct.
He (gurmukh) joining the congregation remains absorbed in the Word.
In the company of flowers the sesame oil also becomes scented.
Nose – string of God’s Will remains in the nose of the Sikh of the Guru i.e. he always keeps himself ready to be  subservient to the Lord.
Taking bath in the ambrosial hours he remains enrapt in the region of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: gur jpu irdY suhylu gur prvyisAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਜਪੁ ਰਿਦੈ ਸੁਹੇਲੁ ਗੁਰ ਪਰਵੇਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: Remembering Guru in his heart he becomes one with Him.

transliteration.english: gur jap ridhai suhel gur paravesiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर जपु रिदै सुहेलु गुर परवेसिआ।
transliteration.en: gur jap ridhai suhel gur paravesiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर जपु रिदै सुहेलु गुर परवेसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr d͡ʒəp rɪd̪æ sʊhel Gʊr pərəʋesɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر جپ ردَے سُهےل گُر پروےسآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: Bwau Bgiq Bau Bylu swD sryisAw[
verse.unicode: ਭਾਉ ਭਗਤਿ ਭਉ ਭੇਲੁ ਸਾਧ ਸਰੇਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: He having the fear of the Lord and a loving devotion, is known as the sadhu of high stature.

transliteration.english: bhaau bhagat bhau bhel saadh saresiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भाउ भगति भउ भेलु साध सरेसिआ।
transliteration.en: bhaau bhagat bhau bhel saadh saresiaa|
transliteration.hi: भाउ भगति भउ भेलु साध सरेसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓɑo ɓəGət̪ ɓo ɓel sɑt̪ə̀ səresɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھاا بھگت بھا بھےل سادھ سرےسآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: inq inq nvl nvyl gurmuiK ByisAw[
verse.unicode: ਨਿਤ ਨਿਤ ਨਵਲ ਨਵੇਲ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭੇਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: The fast colour of the Lord goes on compounding on a gurmukh.

transliteration.english: nit nit naval navel gurmukh bhesiaa|
transliteration.hindi: नित नित नवल नवेल गुरमुखि भेसिआ।
transliteration.en: nit nit naval navel gurmukh bhesiaa|
transliteration.hi: नित नित नवल नवेल गुरमुखि भेसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: nɪt̪ nɪt̪ nəʋəl nəʋel Gʊrəmʊkʰ ɓesɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: نِت نت نول نوےل گُرمکھ بھےسآ۔

en.bdb: The gurmukh only remains with the supreme Lord who is the giver of supreme delight and fearlessness.
The dust of the feet

verse.gurmukhi: gur mUriq kir iDAwn sdw hjUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਧਿਆਨ ਸਦਾ ਹਜੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Concentrate upon the Guru-word considering it as the figure of the Guru who is always with you.

transliteration.english: gur moorat kar dhiaan sadhaa hajoor hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुर मूरति करि धिआन सदा हजूर है।
transliteration.en: gur moorat kar dhiaan sadhaa hajoor hai|
transliteration.hi: गुर मूरति करि धिआन सदा हजूर है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr murət̪ kər t̪ɪəɑn səd̪ɑ həd͡ʒur hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُر مُورت کر دھآن سدا هجُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sbdu igAwnu nyiV n dUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਨੇੜਿ ਨ ਦੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Due to the knowledge of the Word, the gurmukh finds the Lord always near and not far off.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sabadh giaan neR na dhoor hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सबदु गिआनु नेड़ि न दूर है।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sabadh giaan neR na dhoor hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सबदु गिआनु नेड़ि न दूर है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səbəd̪ Gɪəɑn neɽ nə d̪ur hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سبد گآن نےڑ ن دُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: purib ilKqu nIswxu krm AMkUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਪੁਰਬਿ ਲਿਖਤੁ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ਕਰਮ ਅੰਕੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: But the seed of karmas sprouts according to the previous karmas.

transliteration.english: purab likhat neesaan karam a(n)koor hai|
transliteration.hindi: पुरबि लिखतु नीसाणु करम अंकूर है।
transliteration.en: purab likhat neesaan karam a(n)koor hai|
transliteration.hi: पुरबि लिखतु नीसाणु करम अंकूर है।
transliteration.ipa: pʊrəb lɪkʰət̪ nisɑɳ kərəm əŋkur hæ.
transliteration.ur: پُرب لکھت نیِساݨ کرم اںکُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur syvw prDwnu syvk sUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸੇਵਾ ਪਰਧਾਨੁ ਸੇਵਕ ਸੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: The valiant servant becomes leader in doing service to the Guru.

transliteration.english: gur sevaa paradhaan sevak soor hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सेवा परधानु सेवक सूर है।
transliteration.en: gur sevaa paradhaan sevak soor hai|
transliteration.hi: गुर सेवा परधानु सेवक सूर है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr seʋɑ pərət̪ɑn seʋək sur hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سےوا پردھان سےوک سُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUrn prm inDwn sd BrpUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰਨ ਪਰਮ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਸਦ ਭਰਪੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: God, the supreme store house is always full and omnipresent.

transliteration.english: pooran param nidhaan sadh bharapoor hai|
transliteration.hindi: पूरन परम निधान सद भरपूर है।
transliteration.en: pooran param nidhaan sadh bharapoor hai|
transliteration.hi: पूरन परम निधान सद भरपूर है।
transliteration.ipa: purən pərəm nɪt̪ɑn səd̪ ɓərəpur hæ.
transliteration.ur: پُورن پرم ندھان سد بھرپُور هَے۔

en.bdb: His glory shines forth in the holy congregation of the saints.

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK ssIAr Bwnu ikrix TrUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਸਸੀਅਰ ਭਾਨੁ ਕਿਰਣਿ ਠਰੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: The brightness of myriads of moons and suns is subdued before the light of the holy congregation.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh saseear bhaan kiran Tharoor hai|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख ससीअर भानु किरणि ठरूर है।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh saseear bhaan kiran Tharoor hai|
transliteration.hi: लख लख ससीअर भानु किरणि ठरूर है।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ səsiər ɓɑn kɪrəɳ ʈʰərur hæ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ سسیِار بھان کرݨ ٹھرُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: lK lK byd purwix kIrqn cUr hY[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਲਖ ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਣਿ ਕੀਰਤਨ ਚੂਰ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Millions of Vedas and Puranas are insignificant before the praises of the Lord.

transliteration.english: lakh lakh bedh puraan keeratan choor hai|
transliteration.hindi: लख लख बेद पुराणि कीरतन चूर है।
transliteration.en: lakh lakh bedh puraan keeratan choor hai|
transliteration.hi: लख लख बेद पुराणि कीरतन चूर है।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ləkʰ bed̪ pʊrɑɳ kirət̪ən t͡ʃur hæ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ لکھ بےد پُراݨ کیِرتن چُور هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: Bgiq vCl prvwxu crxw DUr hY ]10]
verse.unicode: ਭਗਤਿ ਵਛਲ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ਚਰਣਾ ਧੂਰ ਹੈ ॥੧੦॥

en.bdb: The dust of the feet of the beloved of the Lord is dear to the gurmukh.

transliteration.english: bhagat vachhal paravaan charanaa dhoor hai ||10||
transliteration.hindi: भगति वछल परवाणु चरणा धूर है ॥१०॥
transliteration.en: bhagat vachhal paravaan charanaa dhoor hai ||10||
transliteration.hi: भगति वछल परवाणु चरणा धूर है ॥१०॥
transliteration.ipa: ɓəGət̪ ʋəɕəl pərəʋɑɳ t͡ʃərəɳɑ t̪ur hæ.1ə0.
transliteration.ur: بھگت وچھل پرواݨ چرݨا دھُور هَے ۔۔۱۰۔۔

en.bdb: Oneness of the Guru and the Sikh

verse.gurmukhi: gur isKu isKu gur soie AlKu lKwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖੁ ਸਿਖੁ ਗੁਰ ਸੋਇ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Being one with each other the Guru and the Sikh have made the Lord  perceptible (in the form of Guru).

transliteration.english: gur sikh sikh gur soi alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिखु सिखु गुर सोइ अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur sikh sikh gur soi alakh lakhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिखु सिखु गुर सोइ अलखु लखाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ sɪkʰ Gʊr sɔeɪ ələkʰ ləkʰɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ سکھ گُر سوا الکھ لکھاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur dIiKAw lY isiK isKu sdwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਦੀਖਿਆ ਲੈ ਸਿਖਿ ਸਿਖੁ ਸਦਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Getting initiated by the Guru, the disciple has become a Sikh.

transliteration.english: gur dheekhiaa lai sikh sikh sadhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर दीखिआ लै सिखि सिखु सदाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur dheekhiaa lai sikh sikh sadhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर दीखिआ लै सिखि सिखु सदाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr d̪ikʰɪəɑ læ sɪkʰ sɪkʰ səd̪ɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر دیِکھآ لَے سکھ سکھ سداایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur isK ie`ko hoie jo gur BwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਇੱਕੋ ਹੋਇ ਜੋ ਗੁਰ ਭਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: It was the Lord’s desire that the Guru and the disciple would become one.

transliteration.english: gur sikh i'ko hoi jo gur bhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिख इक्को होइ जो गुर भाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur sikh i'ko hoi jo gur bhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिख इक्को होइ जो गुर भाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ eɪkɔ hɔeɪ d͡ʒɔ Gʊr ɓɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ اّکو هوا جو گُر بھاایا۔

en.bdb: It seems as if the diamond cutting the diamond has brought the other one in one string;
Or the wave of water has merged in water, or the light of one lamp has come to reside in another lamp.
The wondrous deed (of the Lord) seems to have been transformed into a parable.
It is as if the sacred ghee has been produced after churning the curd.
The One Light has scattered in all the three worlds.
It is as if the sacred ghee has been produced after churning the curd.
Oneness of the Guru and the Sikh

verse.gurmukhi: siqgur nwnk dyau gurw guru hoieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਉ ਗੁਰਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਹੋਇਆ।

en.bdb: The True Guru Nanak Dev was the Guru of Gurus.

transliteration.english: satigur naanak dheau guraa gur hoiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सतिगुर नानक देउ गुरा गुरु होइआ।
transliteration.en: satigur naanak dheau guraa gur hoiaa|
transliteration.hi: सतिगुर नानक देउ गुरा गुरु होइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət̪ɪGʊr nɑnək d̪eo Gʊrɑ Gʊr hɔɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: ستگر نانک دےا گُرا گُر هوایا۔

en.bdb: He installed Guru Angad Dev on the invisible abd mysterious throne of equipoise.
Merging Amar Das into the external Lord he made him see the invisible.
Guru Ram  Das was made to quaff the delight of supreme nectar.

verse.gurmukhi: gur Arjn kir syau FoAY FoieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਅਰਜਨ ਕਰਿ ਸੇਉ ਢੋਐ ਢੋਇਆ।

en.bdb: Guru Arjan Dev got the largess of service (from Guru Ram Das).

transliteration.english: gur arajan kar seau ddoaai ddoiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर अरजन करि सेउ ढोऐ ढोइआ।
transliteration.en: gur arajan kar seau ddoaai ddoiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर अरजन करि सेउ ढोऐ ढोइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr ərəd͡ʒən kər seo ʈɔæ ʈɔɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر ارجن کر سےا ڈھواَے ڈھوایا۔

en.bdb: Guru Hargobind also churned the sea (of Word)
And due to the grace of all these truthful personalities, the truth of the Lord has come to reside in the hearts of common people, who have fully devoted their selves to the Word.
Even empty hearts of the people have been filled by sabad, the Word

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuK ABr Bryau Brm Bau KoieAw ]12]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਅਭਰ ਭਰੇਉ ਭਰਮ ਭਉ ਖੋਇਆ ॥੧੨॥

en.bdb: And the Gurmukhs have exterminated their fears and delusions.

transliteration.english: gurmukh abhar bhareau bharam bhau khoiaa ||12||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुख अभर भरेउ भरम भउ खोइआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh abhar bhareau bharam bhau khoiaa ||12||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुख अभर भरेउ भरम भउ खोइआ ॥१२॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ əɓər ɓəreo ɓərəm ɓo kʰɔɪɑ.1ə2.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ ابھر بھرےا بھرم بھا کھوایا ۔۔۱۲۔۔

en.bdb: Gurmukh

verse.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq Bau Bwau shju bYrwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਭਉ ਭਾਉ ਸਹਜੁ ਬੈਰਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Fear (of God) and love (for mankind) being diffused in the holy congregation the sense of non-attachment always prevails.

transliteration.english: saadhasa(n)gat bhau bhaau sahaj bairaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: साधसंगति भउ भाउ सहजु बैरागु है।
transliteration.en: saadhasa(n)gat bhau bhaau sahaj bairaag hai|
transliteration.hi: साधसंगति भउ भाउ सहजु बैरागु है।
transliteration.ipa: sɑt̪əsəŋGət̪ ɓo ɓɑo səhəd͡ʒ bærɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: سادھسںگت بھا بھاا سهج بَےراگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK shij suBwau suriq su jwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਹਜਿ ਸੁਭਾਉ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸੁ ਜਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: By nature, the Gurmukhs  remian alert i.e. their consciousness remains attuned to Sabad, the Word.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sahaj subhaau surat su jaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सहजि सुभाउ सुरति सु जागु है।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sahaj subhaau surat su jaag hai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सहजि सुभाउ सुरति सु जागु है।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səhəd͡ʒ sʊɓɑo sʊrət̪ s d͡ʒɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سهج سُبھاا سُرت سُ جاگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: mDur bcn Awlwau haumY iqAwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਮਧੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਆਲਾਉ ਹਉਮੈ ਤਿਆਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: They speak sweet words and they have already expelled ego from their  selves.

transliteration.english: madhur bachan aalaau haumai tiaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: मधुर बचन आलाउ हउमै तिआगु है।
transliteration.en: madhur bachan aalaau haumai tiaag hai|
transliteration.hi: मधुर बचन आलाउ हउमै तिआगु है।
transliteration.ipa: mət̪ʊr bət͡ʃən əɑlɑo hoʊmæ t̪ɪəɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: مدھر بچن آلاا هامَے تآگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: siqgur miq prQwau sdw Anurwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਮਤਿ ਪਰਥਾਉ ਸਦਾ ਅਨੁਰਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Conducting themselves according to the wisdom of the Guru they always remain imbued in love (of the Lord).

transliteration.english: satigur mat parathaau sadhaa anuraag hai|
transliteration.hindi: सतिगुर मति परथाउ सदा अनुरागु है।
transliteration.en: satigur mat parathaau sadhaa anuraag hai|
transliteration.hi: सतिगुर मति परथाउ सदा अनुरागु है।
transliteration.ipa: sət̪ɪGʊr mət̪ pərət̪ʰɑo səd̪ɑ ənʊrɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: ستگر متِ پرتھاا سدا انراگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwly swau msqik Bwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਆਲੇ ਸਾਉ ਮਸਤਕਿ ਭਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: They feeling fortunate quaff the cup of love (of the Lord).

transliteration.english: piram piaale saau masatak bhaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: पिरम पिआले साउ मसतकि भागु है।
transliteration.en: piram piaale saau masatak bhaag hai|
transliteration.hi: पिरम पिआले साउ मसतकि भागु है।
transliteration.ipa: pɪrəm pɪəɑle sɑo məsət̪ək ɓɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: پِرم پآلے ساا مستک بھاگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: bRhm joiq bRhmwau igAwnu crwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਬ੍ਰਹਮਾਉ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਚਰਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Realising the light of the Supreme in their  mind they become competent to light the lamp of divine knowledge.

transliteration.english: braham jot brahamaau giaan charaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: ब्रहम जोति ब्रहमाउ गिआनु चरागु है।
transliteration.en: braham jot brahamaau giaan charaag hai|
transliteration.hi: ब्रहम जोति ब्रहमाउ गिआनु चरागु है।
transliteration.ipa: bɹəhəm d͡ʒɔt̪ bɹəhəmɑo Gɪəɑn t͡ʃərɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: برهم جوت برهماا گآن چراگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: AMqir gurmiq cwau Ailpqu Adwgu hY[
verse.unicode: ਅੰਤਰਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਚਾਉ ਅਲਿਪਤੁ ਅਦਾਗੁ ਹੈ।

en.bdb: Due  to the wisdom obtained from Guru they have unlimited enthusiasm and  they remain untouched by maya and the dirt of the evil propensities.

transliteration.english: a(n)tar gurmat chaau alipat adhaag hai|
transliteration.hindi: अंतरि गुरमति चाउ अलिपतु अदागु है।
transliteration.en: a(n)tar gurmat chaau alipat adhaag hai|
transliteration.hi: अंतरि गुरमति चाउ अलिपतु अदागु है।
transliteration.ipa: əŋt̪ər Gʊrəmət̪ t͡ʃɑo əlɪpət̪ əd̪ɑG hæ.
transliteration.ur: اںتر گُرمت چاا الپت اداگ هَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh cVHwau sdw suhwgu hY ]13]
verse.unicode: ਵੀਹ ਇਕੀਹ ਚੜ੍ਹਾਉ ਸਦਾ ਸੁਹਾਗੁ ਹੈ ॥੧੩॥

en.bdb: In the context of worldliness, they always conduct themselves in a superior position i.e. if the world is twenty, they are twenty one.

transliteration.english: veeh ikeeh chaRhaau sadhaa suhaag hai ||13||
transliteration.hindi: वीह इकीह चड़्हाउ सदा सुहागु है ॥१३॥
transliteration.en: veeh ikeeh chaRhaau sadhaa suhaag hai ||13||
transliteration.hi: वीह इकीह चड़्हाउ सदा सुहागु है ॥१३॥
transliteration.ipa: ʋih eɪkih t͡ʃəɽʰɑo səd̪ɑ sʊhɑG hæ.1ə3.
transliteration.ur: ویِه اکیِه چڑھاا سدا سُهاگ هَے ۔۔۱۳۔۔

en.bdb: Gurmukh
The words of gurmukh should always be cherished in one’s heart.
By the  benevolent glance of the gurmukh one becomes blest and happy.
Rare are those who attain the sense of discipline and service.
Gurmukhs being full of love are kind to the poor.
Gurmukh is ever steadfast and always adheres to the teachings of the Guru.
One should seek jewels and rubies from the gurmukhs.
Gurmukhs are devoid of deception; they, without becoming victim of Time, go on enjoying the delight of devotion.
Gurmukhs have discriminatory wisdom of swans (who can separate milk from water), and they with their mind and body love their Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: pauVI 15 : mUl mMqR dw gu~Jw Byd
verse.unicode: ਪਉੜੀ ੧੫ : ਮੂਲ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਦਾ ਗੁੱਝਾ ਭੇਦ

en.bdb: Mystery of the Mulmantr

transliteration.english: pauRee 15 : mool ma(n)tr dhaa gu'jhaa bhedh
transliteration.hindi: पउड़ी १५ : मूल मंत्र दा गुज्झा भेद
transliteration.en: pauRee 15 : mool ma(n)tr dhaa gu'jhaa bhedh
transliteration.hi: पउड़ी १५ : मूल मंत्र दा गुज्झा भेद
transliteration.ipa: poʊɽi 1ə5 : mul məŋt̪ɹ d̪ɑ Gʊɖ͡ʐɑ ɓed̪
transliteration.ur: پاڑیِ ۱۵ : مُول مںتر دا گُ~جھا بھےد

en.bdb: By writing 1 (One) in the beginning, it has been shown that Ekankar, God, who subsumes all forms in Him is only one (and not two or three).
Ura,  the first Gurmukhi letter, in the form of Oankar shows the world controlling power of that one Lord.
That Lord has been understood as the True-Name, Creator and the Fearless One.
He is devoid of rancour, beyond time and free from the cycle of transmigration.
Hail the Lord! His mark is truth and He shines in bright effulgent flame.
Five letters (1 Oankar) are altruists; they have in them the power of the person of the Lord.
The individual, understanding their import becomes blest with graceful glance of God who is the essence of delights.

verse.gurmukhi: nau AMig suMn sumwru sMig inrwilAw[
verse.unicode: ਨਉ ਅੰਗਿ ਸੁੰਨ ਸੁਮਾਰੁ ਸੰਗਿ ਨਿਰਾਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: As the numerals from one to nine adding zero with them reach to the infinite count

transliteration.english: nau a(n)g su(n)n sumaar sa(n)g niraaliaa|
transliteration.hindi: नउ अंगि सुँन सुमारु संगि निरालिआ।
transliteration.en: nau a(n)g su(n)n sumaar sa(n)g niraaliaa|
transliteration.hi: नउ अंगि सुँन सुमारु संगि निरालिआ।
transliteration.ipa: no əŋG sʊŋn sʊmɑr səŋG nɪrɑlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: نا اںگ سُنّ سُمار سںگ نرالآ۔

en.bdb: The persons who quaff the cup of love from their beloved become master of infinite powers.

verse.gurmukhi: pauVI 16 : cwr vrn dy eyko BweI
verse.unicode: ਪਉੜੀ ੧੬ : ਚਾਰ ਵਰਨ ਦੇ ਏਕੋ ਭਾਈ

en.bdb: Unity among the four varnas

transliteration.english: pauRee 16 : chaar varan dhe eko bhaiee
transliteration.hindi: पउड़ी १६ : चार वरन दे एको भाई
transliteration.en: pauRee 16 : chaar varan dhe eko bhaiee
transliteration.hi: पउड़ी १६ : चार वरन दे एको भाई
transliteration.ipa: poʊɽi 1ə6 : t͡ʃɑr ʋərən d̪e eekɔ ɓɑei
transliteration.ur: پاڑیِ ۱۶ : چار ورن دے اےکو بھاای

en.bdb: The people of all the four varnas sit together in the company of gurmukhs.
All the disciples become gurmukh as betel leaf, lime and chatehu when mixed become of one red colour.
All the five sounds (produced by different instruments) keep the gurmukhs full of joy.
In the waves of the Word of the true Guru, gurmukhs ever remain in delight.

verse.gurmukhi: sbd suriq prsMg igAwn sMg myilAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਪਰਸੰਗ ਗਿਆਨ ਸੰਗ ਮੇਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: Joining their consciousness to the Guru’s teachings, they become knowledgeable.

transliteration.english: sabadh surat parasa(n)g giaan sa(n)g meliaa|
transliteration.hindi: सबद सुरति परसंग गिआन संग मेलिआ।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat parasa(n)g giaan sa(n)g meliaa|
transliteration.hi: सबद सुरति परसंग गिआन संग मेलिआ।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ pərəsəŋG Gɪəɑn səŋG melɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت پرسںگ گآن سںگ مےلآ۔

en.bdb: They keep themselves absorbed day and night in the great resonance of Gurbani, the holy hymns.
Drowned into the infinite Word and its steadfast colour only the One (God) is realised.
Out of the twelve ways (of yogis) the way of the gurmukhs is the correct way.
Collyrium of the Gursikhs
In the primordial times the Lord ordained.
The Word of the Guru met with the Sabda-brahm Word-God and the ego of creatures got erased.
This  very awe-inspiring word is the collyrium of gurmukhs.
Adopting Gurmat, the wisdom of the Guru, with the grace of the Guru, the delusions are  eschewed.
That primordial being is beyond time and destruction.
He  bestows grace upon His servants like Siva and Sanaks et al.
In all the ages only He is remembered and He alone is the object of concentration of the Sikhs.
Through the taste of the cup of love that Supreme Love is known.
Since the primordial time He has been delighting all.
The true disciple

verse.gurmukhi: murdw hoie murIdu n glI hovxw[
verse.unicode: ਮੁਰਦਾ ਹੋਇ ਮੁਰੀਦੁ ਨ ਗਲੀ ਹੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Only by becoming dead in life, i.e. totally detached, and not through mere verbal jargon one can become a true disciple.

transliteration.english: muradhaa hoi mureedh na galee hovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: मुरदा होइ मुरीदु न गली होवणा।
transliteration.en: muradhaa hoi mureedh na galee hovanaa|
transliteration.hi: मुरदा होइ मुरीदु न गली होवणा।
transliteration.ipa: mʊrəd̪ɑ hɔeɪ mʊrid̪ nə Gəli hɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: مُردا هوا مُریِد ن گلیِ هووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: swbru isdik shIdu Brm Bau Kovxw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਬਰੁ ਸਿਦਕਿ ਸਹੀਦੁ ਭਰਮ ਭਉ ਖੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: One could be such a person only after getting sacrificed for truth and contentment and by eschewing delusions and fears.

transliteration.english: saabar sidhak saheedh bharam bhau khovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: साबरु सिदकि सहीदु भरम भउ खोवणा।
transliteration.en: saabar sidhak saheedh bharam bhau khovanaa|
transliteration.hi: साबरु सिदकि सहीदु भरम भउ खोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: sɑbər sɪd̪ək səhid̪ ɓərəm ɓo kʰɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: سابر سدک سهیِد بھرم بھا کھووݨا۔

en.bdb: The true disciple is a boughten slave who is ever busy in the service of the Master.

verse.gurmukhi: nw iqsu BuK n nId n Kwxw sovxw[
verse.unicode: ਨਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਭੁਖ ਨ ਨੀਦ ਨ ਖਾਣਾ ਸੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He forgets hunger, sleep, food and rest.

transliteration.english: naa tis bhukh na needh na khaanaa sovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: ना तिसु भुख न नीद न खाणा सोवणा।
transliteration.en: naa tis bhukh na needh na khaanaa sovanaa|
transliteration.hi: ना तिसु भुख न नीद न खाणा सोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: nɑ t̪ɪs ɓʊkʰ nə nid̪ nə kʰɑɳɑ sɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: نا تس بھُکھ ن نیِد ن کھاݨا سووݨا۔

en.bdb: He  grinds fresh flour (for free kitchen) and serves by fetching water.

verse.gurmukhi: pKy dI qwgId pg mil Dovxw[
verse.unicode: ਪਖੇ ਦੀ ਤਾਗੀਦ ਪਗ ਮਲਿ ਧੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He fans (the congregation) and washes nicely the feet of the Guru.

transliteration.english: pakhe dhee taageedh pag mal dhovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पखे दी तागीद पग मलि धोवणा।
transliteration.en: pakhe dhee taageedh pag mal dhovanaa|
transliteration.hi: पखे दी तागीद पग मलि धोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pəkʰe d̪i t̪ɑGid̪ pəG məl t̪ɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پکھے دیِ تاگیِد پگ مل دھووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: syvk hoie sMjIdu n hsxu rovxw[
verse.unicode: ਸੇਵਕ ਹੋਇ ਸੰਜੀਦੁ ਨ ਹਸਣੁ ਰੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: The servant  always remains disciplined and has nothing to do with wailing and laughing.

transliteration.english: sevak hoi sa(n)jeedh na hasan rovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: सेवक होइ संजीदु न हसणु रोवणा।
transliteration.en: sevak hoi sa(n)jeedh na hasan rovanaa|
transliteration.hi: सेवक होइ संजीदु न हसणु रोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: seʋək hɔeɪ səŋd͡ʒid̪ nə həsəɳ rɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: سےوک هوا سںجیِد ن هسݨ رووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: dr drvys rsIdu iprm rsu Bovxw[
verse.unicode: ਦਰ ਦਰਵੇਸ ਰਸੀਦੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਭੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: This way he becomes dervish at the door of the Lord and gets drenched in the delights of the rains of love.

transliteration.english: dhar dharaves raseedh piram ras bhovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: दर दरवेस रसीदु पिरम रसु भोवणा।
transliteration.en: dhar dharaves raseedh piram ras bhovanaa|
transliteration.hi: दर दरवेस रसीदु पिरम रसु भोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ər d̪ərəʋes rəsid̪ pɪrəm rəs ɓɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: در دروےس رسیِد پرم رس بھووݨا۔

en.bdb: He will be seen as the first moon of Id day (which the Muslims eagerly wait for in order to break their long fasts), and only he will come out as a perfect man.
What is demanded of a disciple  ?

verse.gurmukhi: pYrI pY pw Kwku murIdY QIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾ ਖਾਕੁ ਮੁਰੀਦੈ ਥੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: By becoming the dust of the feet the disciple is required to be near the feet of the the Guru.

transliteration.english: pairee pai paa khaak mureedhai theevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पैरी पै पा खाकु मुरीदै थीवणा।
transliteration.en: pairee pai paa khaak mureedhai theevanaa|
transliteration.hi: पैरी पै पा खाकु मुरीदै थीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pæri pæ pɑ kʰɑk mʊrid̪æ t̪ʰiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پَےریِ پَے پا کھاک مُریِدَے تھیِوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur mUriq musqwku mir mir jIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਮੁਸਤਾਕੁ ਮਰਿ ਮਰਿ ਜੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Becoming an avid suiter of the form (word) of the Guru and being dead to greed, infatuation and other relational propensities, he should remain alive in the world.

transliteration.english: gur moorat musataak mar mar jeevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर मूरति मुसताकु मरि मरि जीवणा।
transliteration.en: gur moorat musataak mar mar jeevanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर मूरति मुसताकु मरि मरि जीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr murət̪ mʊsət̪ɑk mər mər d͡ʒiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر مُورت مُستاک مر مرِ جیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Repudiating all worldly connections he must remain dyed in the colour of the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: hor n JKxu Jwk srix mnu sIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਹੋਰ ਨ ਝਖਣੁ ਝਾਕ ਸਰਣਿ ਮਨੁ ਸੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Seeking no shelter elsewhere he should keep his mind absorbed in the shelterof God, the Guru.

transliteration.english: hor na jhakhan jhaak saran man seevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: होर न झखणु झाक सरणि मनु सीवणा।
transliteration.en: hor na jhakhan jhaak saran man seevanaa|
transliteration.hi: होर न झखणु झाक सरणि मनु सीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: hɔr nə ɖ͡ʐəkʰəɳ ɖ͡ʐɑk sərəɳ mən siʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: هور ن جھکھݨ جھاک سرݨ من سیِوݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: iprm ipAwlw pwk AimA rsu pIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਪਿਰਮ ਪਿਆਲਾ ਪਾਕ ਅਮਿਅ ਰਸੁ ਪੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Sacred is the cup of the love of the beloved; he should quaff that only.

transliteration.english: piram piaalaa paak amia ras peevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पिरम पिआला पाक अमिअ रसु पीवणा।
transliteration.en: piram piaalaa paak amia ras peevanaa|
transliteration.hi: पिरम पिआला पाक अमिअ रसु पीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pɪrəm pɪəɑlɑ pɑk əmɪə rəs piʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پِرم پآلا پاک اما رس پیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Making humility his abode he should get poised in it.
Divorcing the (tastes of ) ten organs i.e.not being caught in their dragnet, he should attain equipose.

verse.gurmukhi: swvDwn gur vwk n mn BrmIvxw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਵਧਾਨ ਗੁਰ ਵਾਕ ਨ ਮਨ ਭਰਮੀਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He must be fully conscious about the word of Guru and should not allow the mind to be entrapped in delusions.

transliteration.english: saavadhaan gur vaak na man bharameevanaa|
transliteration.hindi: सावधान गुर वाक न मन भरमीवणा।
transliteration.en: saavadhaan gur vaak na man bharameevanaa|
transliteration.hi: सावधान गुर वाक न मन भरमीवणा।
transliteration.ipa: sɑʋət̪ɑn Gʊr ʋɑk nə mən ɓərəmiʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: ساودھان گُر واک ن من بھرمیِوݨا۔

en.bdb: Absorption of consciousness in the Word makes  him alert and this way one gets across the Word – ocean.
Who is the acknowledged Sikh   ?
He is true Sikh who surrenders before the Guru and bows his head;

verse.gurmukhi: gur crxI icqu lwie mQw lwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਚਰਣੀ ਚਿਤੁ ਲਾਇ ਮਥਾ ਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Who puts his mind and forehead on the feet of Guru;

transliteration.english: gur charanee chit lai mathaa laiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर चरणी चितु लाइ मथा लाइआ।
transliteration.en: gur charanee chit lai mathaa laiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर चरणी चितु लाइ मथा लाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr t͡ʃərəɳi t͡ʃɪt̪ lɑeɪ mət̪ʰɑ lɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر چرݨیِ چت لاا متھا لاایا۔

en.bdb: Who holding dear to his heart the teachings of the Guru expels ego from his self;
Who loves the will of Lord and has attained equipoise by becoming Guru-oriented, gurmukh;

verse.gurmukhi: sbid suriq ilv lwie hukmu kmwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਇ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਕਮਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Who by merging his consciousness in the Word has acted according to the divine Will (hukam).

transliteration.english: sabadh surat liv lai hukam kamaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सबदि सुरति लिव लाइ हुकमु कमाइआ।
transliteration.en: sabadh surat liv lai hukam kamaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सबदि सुरति लिव लाइ हुकमु कमाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: səbəd̪ sʊrət̪ lɪʋ lɑeɪ hʊkəm kəmɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبد سُرت لو لاا هُکم کماایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq BY Bwie inj Gru pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਭੈ ਭਾਇ ਨਿਜ ਘਰੁ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He (the true Sikh) as the result of his love and fear of holy congregation attains his own self (atma).

transliteration.english: saadhasa(n)gat bhai bhai nij ghar paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: साधसंगति भै भाइ निज घरु पाइआ।
transliteration.en: saadhasa(n)gat bhai bhai nij ghar paiaa|
transliteration.hi: साधसंगति भै भाइ निज घरु पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sɑt̪əsəŋGət̪ ɓæ ɓɑeɪ nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سادھسںگت بھَے بھاا نج گھر پاایا۔

en.bdb: He remains stuck to the lotus feet of the Guru like the bumblebee.
Getting enveloped in this delight  he goes on quaffing the nectar.
Blessed is the mother of such a person. Only his coming to this world is fruitful.
